BANKING AFFAIRS

BANKING GENERAL KNOWLEDGE

[SOURCES]
The government has proposed amalgamation of Bank of Baroda, Vijaya Bank, and Dena Bank to create India’s 3rd largest globally competitive Bank recently. Vijaya Bank based in

(A) Chennai

(B) New Delhi

(C) Kolkata

(D) ** Bengaluru

EXPLANATIONS BELOW

Concept note-1: -All branches of Vijaya Bank and Dena Bank have now become Bank of Baroda branches. Bank of Baroda (BoB) said on December 20 that it had completed the integration/migration of 3, 898 branches of Vijaya Bank and Dena Bank.

Concept note-2: -State-run Bank of Baroda on Sunday said it has completed integration of 3, 898 branches of erstwhile Vijaya Bank and Dena Bank with itself. In a first three-way amalgamation, Vijaya Bank and Dena Bank were merged with Bank of Baroda from April 1, 2019.

Concept note-3: -Bank of Baroda (BoB) has completed the integration of 3, 898 branches of Vijaya Bank and Dena Bank with itself.

Concept note-4: -This amalgamation will present Bank of Baroda as the global conglomerate in the banking sector aiming to achieve the higher working efficiency, financial stability and wider operationality. It will not only facilitate national and global outreach but will also integrate public banking sector in India.

Try yourself to solve below questions:

CONCEPT QUESTION- 1 :

Is Bank of Baroda was merged with Vijaya Bank and Dena Bank?

CONCEPT QUESTION- 2 :

When did Dena Bank and Vijaya Bank merged with Bank of Baroda?

CONCEPT QUESTION- 3 :

Which Bank merged with Dena and Vijaya Bank?

CONCEPT QUESTION- 4 :

Why Bank of Baroda is merged with Vijaya Bank and Dena Bank?

CONCEPT QUESTION- 5 :

How many public sector banks are in India after Bank of Baroda merged with Vijaya Bank and Dena Bank?

CONCEPT QUESTION- 6 :

What is the record date of Vijaya Bank merger?

CONCEPT QUESTION- 7 :

Which of the following banks will merge together to form the country’s second largest lender?

CONCEPT QUESTION- 8 :

Which of the following Bank was the first Bank to be acquired by BoB?

CONCEPT QUESTION- 9 :

How many Bank merged with which Bank?
